org.apache.jackrabbit.j2ee
Class Installer

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.jackrabbit.j2ee.Installer

public class Installer
extends Object

Provides very basic installation capabilities.

                      throws javax.servlet.ServletException,

Handles the installation.

Parameters:
